long_instructions.https://studio.code.org/s/iceage/stage/1:
Sid (actor 1) wants to gather everyone for a new adventure. Can you help him say "Hello!" by dragging the `say` block out and connecting it to the bottom of the `when run` event?   

Don't forget to type "Hello!" inside!
Manny (actor 2) found Sid (actor 1) and wants to invite him on an adventure. Help them greet each other by using the the `actor ___ say` block twice.
Scrat is looking for his acorn! Can you help him move the last 200 pixels?
Diego (actor 1) is searching for Manny (actor 2). Can you help bring the two together? Connect a block to the `when actor touches` event to play a sound when they find each other.
The `repeat forever` block allows you to run code continuously. Can you put blocks inside of it to help Granny get some exercise by moving left and right repeatedly?

Can you help Sid call for his friends when you click on him? 
Once you're done, press "Run" to play.  Click on Sid to see your code work!

Scrat is still looking for acorns! 
Help him scamper around by attaching a `move actor 1` block to each of the events and changing the direction to work for each arrow key. 
When you’re done, click "Run" and try to collect all of the acorns.

Here is your code from the last puzzle, as well as the code to move Granny left and right. 
Can you finish the program to make it so that you both **play a sound** and **score a point** when Sid and Granny collide? 
Press "Run" to play the game.

Everyone needs to move faster because an ice storm is coming! 
Change the scene to an icy background and set Sid’s (actor 1) speed to fast.
Press "Run" and move Sid to Diego to warn him.

Sid wants to let his grandmother, Granny, know that he loves her.   

Use the `actor __ throw` command to have Sid (actor 1) throw hearts at Granny (actor 2)! 
Set Granny's mood to happy when she gets hit with the hearts.

Time to create your own game or story!  

When you're done, click "Finish" to let friends try your game on their phones, tablets, or computers!
Don't know what to make? Click the hints for details.

https://studio.code.org/s/iceage/stage/1.iceage_hello1_a: You only need to add one block to solve this puzzle.  Drag the `say` block out from the toolbar and connect it to the `when run` event block that is already in the workspace. Next, type "Hello!" inside.

https://studio.code.org/s/iceage/stage/1.iceage_hello2_a: To solve this puzzle, you will need to have Sid say something using the `actor 1 say` block.  You will also need to have Manny say something with the `actor 2 say` block.

https://studio.code.org/s/iceage/stage/1.iceage_hello3_a: Use the `move actor 1 right by 200 pixels` block to solve this puzzle.

https://studio.code.org/s/iceage/stage/1.iceage_move_to_actor_a: For this puzzle, you can either move Diego down by 200 pixels, or move Manny up by 200 pixels.
https://studio.code.org/s/iceage/stage/1.iceage_move_to_actor_b: Connect the `play ___ sound` block to the `when actor 1 touches actor 2` event to finish this challenge.

https://studio.code.org/s/iceage/stage/1.iceage_repeat_a: Use both the `move actor 1 left` and `move actor 1 right` blocks to solve this puzzle.

https://studio.code.org/s/iceage/stage/1.iceage_click_hello_a: Add one or more `actor 1 say` blocks to the `when clicked` event to complete this puzzle.

https://studio.code.org/s/iceage/stage/1.iceage_move_events_a: Each of the `when ___ arrow` events will need to have a different `move actor 1` command connected to it to solve this puzzle.

https://studio.code.org/s/iceage/stage/1.iceage_sound_and_points_a: You will need to add two blocks beneath the `when actor 1 touches actor 2` event.
https://studio.code.org/s/iceage/stage/1.iceage_sound_and_points_b: You will need both the `score a point` block and the 'play \_\_\_\_ sound\` block to pass this level.

https://studio.code.org/s/iceage/stage/1.iceage_warn_ice_age_a: You should only have to add two blocks to get this puzzle where it needs to be.
https://studio.code.org/s/iceage/stage/1.iceage_warn_ice_age_b: Add both new blocks beneath the `when run` event to have them happen immediately after the program starts.

https://studio.code.org/s/iceage/stage/1.iceage_throw_hearts_a: When do you want to throw hearts at granny?  When an arrow is pressed? When you click on Sid?  When you click on Granny?  The choice is yours!
https://studio.code.org/s/iceage/stage/1.iceage_throw_hearts_b: To get granny to be happy when she receives a heart, you will need to connect the `set actor 2 mood to happy` block beneath the `when actor 2 touches projectile` event.

https://studio.code.org/s/iceage/stage/1.iceage_free_play_a: Can you make Sid and Manny have an Ice Crystal fight?
https://studio.code.org/s/iceage/stage/1.iceage_free_play_b: Make Granny chase Diego.  End the game as a win if she catches him.
https://studio.code.org/s/iceage/stage/1.iceage_free_play_c: Can you have Sid throw snowflakes at Diego and have Diego get bigger each time one hits?  End the game as a win if Diego gets hit 5 times.
